nodes.text: SG-619 was a male Human who served the Galactic Empire as a scout trooper.
In 1 ABY, SG-619 was stationed at the Imperial Outpost on the remote planet of Dantooine, where he served under SG-567.

On one of his scouting missions, he was joined by an Imperial agent who had previously helped SG-567 with a malfunctioning droideka. During their patrol, they were attacked by stranded Rebel scouts, but were able to kill their attackers and return safely to the outpost.
